name: Robot Party: Octopus Play
description:
You're invited to the party!
Are you familiar with the Octopus game?
Inspired by the popular Korean movies "Squid Game" - a survival drama television, Robot Party was designed for the survival game lovers who're addicted to challenging mini games. You have to face multiple death games to change your own destiny because you got no choice.

Challenges
- Red light green light.
- Dalgona candy.
- Paper flip.
- Hide n Seek.
- Kill io.
...

The key is to
Eliminate other players.
Be the last one to survive.

Winning all the challenges to win cash and become the billionaire.
Dead or live, can you survive?
